main event: On 25 February 1953, two military observers from Great Falls AFB, Montana, reported sightings of an unidentified flying object that exhibited bright, flickering lights and maneuvered at high speed.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of 1,000 to 5,000 feet,The sighting lasted approximately 10 to 15 minutes,The object changed altitude rapidly and appeared to disintegrate during its maneuvering,This incident involved multiple sightings over a few days by the same observers,Official investigation by the United States Air Force's Project Blue Book was initiated due to the sightings.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with bright, flickering lights
witnesses: Lieutenant Peter Marquart and Sergeant Dwyer M. Montana
